Container.Name: binhex-minecraftbedrockserver
Container.Overview: Minecraft is a sandbox video game created by Swedish game developer Markus Persson and released by Mojang in 2011. The game allows players to build with a variety of different blocks in a 3D procedurally generated world, requiring creativity from players. Other activities in the game include exploration, resource gathering, crafting, and combat. Multiple game modes that change gameplay are available, including—but not limited to—a survival mode, in which players must acquire resources to build the world and maintain health, and a creative mode, where players have unlimited resources to build with.

Config.Name: Port: Web Interface
Config.Description: This is the Web UI port for the console.

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: This is the container path to your configuration files, e.g. databases, configuration files, logs etc.

Config.Name: Variable: CREATE_BACKUP_HOURS
Config.Description: Specify the hour in 24 hour format to perform the backup.

Config.Name: Variable: PURGE_BACKUP_DAYS
Config.Description: Specify the number of days before a backup is considered for purging.

Config.Name: Variable: ENABLE_WEBUI_CONSOLE
Config.Description: Specify whether you want to enable the Web UI console.

Config.Name: Variable: ENABLE_WEBUI_AUTH
Config.Description: Specify whether you want authentication prompts when connecting to the Web UI console.

Config.Name: Variable: WEBUI_CONSOLE_TITLE
Config.Description: Specify the Web UI console title.

Config.Name: Variable: STARTUP_CMD
Config.Description: Specify the Minecraft command you want to run on startup of the server.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_COMMAND
Config.Description: The command to execute in the healthcheck script, if not specified this will be DNS and HTTPS checks against google.com.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_ACTION
Config.Description: The action to execute in the healthcheck script, if not specified this will be 'exit 1', if you want the container to exit on failure then set this to 'kill 1'.

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the running container

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the running container
